radiographic_examinations.findings: Reduced or absent sensory nerve action potential (SNAP) amplitudes of the upper and lower limb sensory nerves.
Diffuse neurogenic changes in the cranial, cervico-thoracic, and lumbosacral segments with fibrillation potentials.
Chronic neurogenic changes with mild myopathic changes (few necrotic fibers, rare regenerating fibers, increased internalized nuclei, fiber splitting) in quadriceps muscle.
